patthana16.66:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocitto dhammo
patthana16.66:1.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.66:1.1_2: nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana16.66:1.1_3: nasanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana16.66:1.1_4: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.66:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
